title: 'copas: An R package for Fitting the Copas Selection Model'
abstract: This article describes the R package copas which is an add-on package to
  the R package meta. The R package copas can be used to fit the Copas selection model
  to adjust for bias in meta-analysis. A clinical example is used to illustrate fitting
  and interpreting the Copas selection model.
